post:
* 2 CPU Cores
* 512MB RAM
* 512MB vSWAP
* 20GB HDD
* 1 IPv4, IPv6 should be possible, too
* 100GB Traffic @ 30Mbit

For the first, this beta will run for almost 1 month.

This time I even use SolusVM. If you want one, please let me know: vpsbeta@nerdsein.org. Actually I reserved 10 IPv4 for this test, let us see, how good it will go maybe I throw more in.
